Package it.unipr.sowide.actodes.distribution.mina

Class MinaServerHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.mina.core.service.IoHandlerAdapter
      • it.unipr.sowide.actodes.distribution.mina.MinaServerHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.mina.core.service.IoHandler
    public final class MinaServerHandler
extends org.apache.mina.core.service.IoHandlerAdapter
    The MinaServerSessionHandler class is an handler used by the broker actor space for managing the discovery and the communication with the other actor spaces.
